text: Geraint Owen Jones MBE was born 14 July 1976 in Kundiawa, Papua New Guinea. He is a former cricketer who played for England and Papua New Guinea. He played 34 tests and 51 one-day internationals for both countries from 2004 to 2014. ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Papua New Guinean cricketers Category:English and Welsh cricketers Category:Welsh sportspeople
title: Geraint Jones
